short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skips known songs on Spotify web player to help discover new music

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you find new music on the Spotify!

You can toggle the extension to enter a "skip known songs" mode. Then the extension will skip any songs in your playlists or that it's seen you listen to before.

This makes it easier to find new music. Instead of song radios full of songs you've already heard or added you can filter them to only new songs.
